de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.storage
Interface ContentStorage

All Superinterfaces:
Component
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultContentStorage
public interface ContentStorage
extends Component

Represents a storage of documents inside of a host, which can be used by applications and overlays to store documents locally and fetch them again later.

Version:
1.0, 11/25/2007
Author:
Sebastian Kaune , Konstantin Pussep
